name: It's not genocide if it's for the good. (BaeSama)
name_original: It's not genocide if it's for the good. (BaeSama)
description:
This game has been made for the Ludum Dare 42 (yep. It's late). 

It was a challenge for me because the goal was to produced everything from the Game design, Programming to the Art. 

The game is not balanced, sorry :(
